text:
Eaze | Backend Devs | San Francisco | ONSITE | http://eaze.com

Marijuana Delivery.

70+ employees, 20 devs and growing. Marijuana delivered in 20 minutes or less across Californian urban areas.

Looking for backend Node.js or .Net devs (legacy monolith -> Node microservices). Steady scaling, hundreds of drivers, thousands of deliveries, new features and products constantly.

Join us before weed goes recreational next year. email: jonah@eaze.com

Also hiring: DevOps (chef, AWS, etc)
